alert.note: Alert for Carquinez Strait and Delta; Northern San Joaquin Valley; Southern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 01 at 3:45AM PST until March 02 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 27 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...Southern Sacramento Valley, Carquinez Strait and Delta and Northern San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 8 AM PST this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 8 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Carquinez Strait and Delta; Northern San Joaquin Valley; Southern Sacramento Valley
